DAZ Script DOM document fragment node. More...

Inheritance diagram for DzDomDocumentFragment:

Constructors

 DzDomDocumentFragment ()

Detailed Description

DAZ Script DOM document fragment node.

Represents a document fragment node in a DOM document.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzDomDocumentFragment::DzDomDocumentFragment (  ) 

Default constructor. Typically, you will not construct these directly, but will call DzDomDocument::createDocumentFragment() to create a new fragment as a member of a document.
